description: Data Gateway Service - AGENT-DATA-004. Monitors unified query routing, multi-source aggregation, caching, schema translation, source health, connection pools, and circuit breaker state for the GreenLang Climate OS data gateway layer.

panels.description: Total number of queries processed by the data gateway across all sources
panels.title: Total Queries

panels.description: Number of queries currently being processed by the data gateway
panels.title: Active Queries

panels.description: Percentage of queries served from cache (hits / (hits + misses)). Higher is better.
panels.title: Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Number of data sources currently reporting healthy status
panels.title: Healthy Sources

panels.description: Current rate of processing errors across all data sources. Any sustained error rate requires investigation.
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: Rate of queries per second processed by the data gateway, broken down by data source
panels.title: Query Rate by Source

panels.description: Query duration percentiles (p50, p95, p99) across all data sources. SLO target: p95 < 5s.
panels.title: Query Duration p50/p95/p99

panels.description: Distribution of query results by status: success, error, timeout, cached
panels.title: Query Status Distribution

panels.description: Rate of cache hits and misses over time. A widening gap between hits and misses indicates improving cache effectiveness.
panels.title: Cache Hit/Miss Rate

panels.description: Cache hit ratio per data source. Sources with low ratios may benefit from longer TTLs or query pattern optimization.
panels.title: Cache Hit Ratio by Source

panels.description: Distribution of response payload sizes returned by the data gateway. Large responses may indicate inefficient queries.
panels.title: Response Size Distribution

panels.description: Health status of each configured data source, including current status, last response time, and circuit breaker state
panels.title: Source Health Status

panels.description: Current connection pool utilization per data source. High utilization indicates connection pressure.
panels.title: Connection Pool Usage

panels.description: Count of data sources reporting unhealthy status over time. Sustained unhealthy sources degrade gateway availability.
panels.title: Health Check Failures

panels.description: Rate of routing decisions per second, broken down by routing strategy (round-robin, least-latency, affinity, failover)
panels.title: Routing Decisions

panels.description: Rate of schema translations performed between data source formats and the canonical GreenLang schema, by direction (inbound/outbound)
panels.title: Schema Translations

panels.description: Rate of multi-source aggregation operations by status (success, partial, error)
panels.title: Aggregation Operations

panels.description: Rate of processing errors per second, broken down by data source. Identifies which sources are producing the most errors.
panels.title: Error Rate by Source

panels.description: Distribution of errors by type (connection, timeout, validation, schema, authentication, rate_limit)
panels.title: Error Types

panels.description: Table showing recent error details by source, error type, and count for identifying the most problematic areas
panels.title: Error Details

title: Data Gateway Service
